chapter.title: UIComponent Tags
chapter.para: Liferay Faces Alloy provides the following UIComponent tags as part of its component suite.

sect1.title: The aui:button-row tag
sect1.para: The aui:button-row tag renders a span element with CSS class name "aui-button-holder" that will be positioned by Alloy UI CSS.

row.entry: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute.

The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute.

sect1.title: The aui:column tag
sect1.para: The aui:column tag renders a div element with CSS class name "aui-column" that will be positioned by Alloy UI CSS.

row.entry: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute.
Boolean flag indicating whether or not this is the first column. The default value is “false”.

Boolean flag indicating whether or not this component is to be rendered during the RENDER_RESPONSE phase of the JSF lifecycle. The default value is “true”.
The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute.

sect1.title: The aui:field tag
sect1.para: The aui:field tag renders a span element with CSS class name "aui-field" that will be positioned by Alloy UI CSS.

row.entry: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute.
The position of the label. Valid values are: left, right.
The text value for the rendered label.

The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute.
The type of field. Valid values are: checkbox, boolean, menu, select.
